oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On envelope: "#1073 Babi Yar Park, 1992." On photograph: "Phil Goodstein, Babi Yar Park '92."

Large Markers at Babi Yar Park, Denver, Colorado. They say: "[Hebrew words] In memoriam, To the two hundred thousand victims, who died, Babi Yar, Kiev Ukraine, USSR, September 29, 1941 - November 6, 1943, The majority Jews with Ukrainians, And others, [Hebrew], [Russian]." and "Decades ago..., Still the aching sadness, Innocents....., People who loved, Forever silenced by Nazi terror, Sharing eternally....., The mystic number..... six million, A holocaust for the Jews of Europe, A tragedy for all humanity, Remember....."
